item.description:
Join us to share how you are increasing your awareness and utilizing L.O.A. to consciously attract what you want in your life. What changes are you making to create a life of joy and ease?

If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Looking forward to seeing everyone. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private room in back from 10a.m.-Noon.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: November - A.M. L.O.A. Meetup
